search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Razorpay (razorpay-1.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Razorpay can be found here: [https://razorpay.com/pricing/](https://razorpay.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Business Banking+ is operated under RZPX Private Limited where the banking services are provided by scheduled commercial banks.

Digital Lending is operated under Razorpay Tech Solutions Private Limited, a Lending Service Provider to Regulated Entities authorised by RBI.

Supercharge your business with Razorpay
---------------------------------------

Sign up now to experience the future of payments and offer your customers the best checkout experience.

*   Quick onboarding
*   Access to entire product suite
*   API access
*   24x7 support

[Sign Up Now](https://accounts.razorpay.com/auth/?auth_intent=signup)

![Image 185](https://razorpay.com/build/browser/static/footer-signup.6bf7413f.svg)

![Image 186: Razorpay logo](https://razorpay.com/build/browser/static/razorpay-logo.5cdb58df.svg)Razorpay is the only payments solution in India that allows businesses to accept, process and disburse payments with its product suite. It gives you access to all payment modes including credit card, debit card, netbanking, UPI and popular wallets including JioMoney, Mobikwik, Airtel Money, FreeCharge, Ola Money and PayZapp.

RazorpayX supercharges your business banking experience, bringing effectiveness, efficiency, and excellence to all financial processes. With RazorpayX, businesses can get access to fully-functional current accounts, supercharge their payouts and automate payroll compliance.

Manage your marketplace, automate bank transfers, collect recurring payments, share invoices with customers and avail working capital loans - all from a single platform. Fast forward your business with Razorpay.

Disclaimer: The RazorpayX powered Current Account and VISA corporate credit card are provided by RBI licensed banks. Your RazorpayX powered current account is provided by our partner banks i.e, ICICI, RBL, Yes bank, in accordance with RBI regulations. RazorpayX itself is not a bank and doesn't hold or claim to hold a banking license.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Razorpay offers a free tier with no setup or annual maintenance fees. Transaction fees are usage-based, with additional GST charges.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic payment processing with no setup or annual fees.
Tailored solutions for businesses with monthly revenue exceeding ₹5 Lakh.
